a.span: Scholarship Information / Post High School Planning

font.strong: "Working Together to Put Student Success First"

div.font:
The Sherman County School District Office is located in Moro, Oregon, which is about 2 hours east of Portland, Oregon.
The School District consists of one Pre-K - 12th grade school along with a Public/School Library facility. "Sherman County School", located in Moro, Oregon.
